name: Client Projects
description:
The essence of this board is to provide a high-level overview of your project. This is the place to plan and track your progress. 
For more information and a full explanation of how to use this template check out this video:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug5TyvMd-3Y&feature=youtu.be

columns.title: Timeline
columns.description: The column shows a timeframe for  each activity. You can see a summary of these activities at the bottom of each group.

name: Activities
description:
The activities board shows all the activities that are added using the Emails & Activities in the page.
Every time you add an activity through Emails & Activities, a new activity will be added to this board.
